sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pET302-6His-dCas9-Halo was a gift from Timothée Lionnet (Addgene plasmid # 72269 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:72269 ; RRID:Addgene_72269)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Encodes a Halo-labeled fusion of nuclease deficient Cas9.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: rop
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: rop
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Rop protein, which maintains plasmids at low copy number

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: dCas9
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: RNA-guided DNA-binding protein that lacks endonuclease activity due to the D10A mutation in the RuvC catalytic domain and the H840A mutation in the HNH catalytic domain
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: catalytically dead mutant of the Cas9 endonuclease from the Streptococcus pyogenes Type II CRISPR/Cas system
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: dCas9
T7 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for bacteriophage T7 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T7 promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lacI
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lacI
pBRrevBam
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pBR322 vectors, tet region, downstream of BamHI, reverse primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pBR322 vectors, upsteam of EcoRI site, forward primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: HaloTag(R)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: modified bacterial dehalogenase that forms covalent bonds with chloroalkane derivatives

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: transcription terminator for bacteriophage T7 RNA polymerase
